code:
%% Ingestion + RAG pipeline diagram
%% Render with Mermaid CLI (mmdc) or VS Code Mermaid Preview
flowchart TD
  subgraph Source
    A[Files: pdf/docx/txt] -->|extract text| B[ingestion.py]
  end
  B --> C[chunking.py\n(split into chunks)]
  C --> D[embeddings.py\n(encode chunks)]
  D --> E[vector_store.py\n(FAISS index)]
  E --> F[rag.py\n(retrieve + score)]
  F --> G[LLM request\n(OpenAI / HF)]
  G --> H[user-facing app\n(FastAPI / Streamlit)]

  classDef default fill:#fff,stroke:#333;
  class B,C,D,E,F,G,H default
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
repo_description: RAG based question and answer app. It uses Python, FAISS, Streamlit and Vector Database
